How to (Smartly) Use LLMs to Learn UX Large Language Models (LLMs) have become almost irresistible tools for learning. They’re getting smarter, more specialised, and more helpful, delivering better results and empowering education. Yet, concerns are growing about dependency and the fear that LLMs might replace our own mental effort.
In this article, I’d like to share my thoughts on how to use LLMs to learn about UX, and what to keep in mind when doing so.
